remarks: Version of ~ equsex with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-equsexv.nf $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-equsexv.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-equsexv $p |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d x y $.
